overview:
Evan Cohen is a strategy and operations executive with extensive experience managing high-growth internet start-ups.

Most recently, Evan worked at Bebo (and then AOL, post-acquisition), as Sr Vice President of Strategy and Operations. Evan’s role was to identify, assess and push forward commercial growth opportunities for People Networks (a division of AOL comprised of Bebo, AIM and ICQ) as well as to help manage the operational challenges associated with its rapid growth. Company initiatives included international expansion, innovations around communication products and services, and content partnerships with original web production companies as well as traditional rights owners.
